website_summaries.verdict: This simple "drop and charge" system works smoothly.
pros: With 2 included USB dongles that plug directly into your DualShock 4 controllers, it's easy to place the controllers on the dock and charge them up
The USB dongles are slim and don't get in the way while you play
The style of this docking station fits the PlayStation 4 well
cons: The included USB cable is quite short at 1 foot

customer_reviews.title: Love it, converted my husband from his charging station to this one.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this charger. My husband has a different charging station for his camper and when he came home he fell in love with it too. He actually swiped one of my USB pads so I have to get a replacement. He’s going to be replacing his travel charger with this one. It’s so easy to just set it down and let it charge than trying to keep track of wires. I also just plugged it directly into the wall, since most complaints were about it not charging if the PlayStation is off. I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: hlejeune

customer_reviews.title: The best docking charger I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through a few different types, and I can recommend this one. It it very sturdy, easy to put controller in, and lights up letting you know it's charging. My next purchase will be the Venom for the xbox system, after seeing how well this works on the PS4. Looks cool too, always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Co

customer_reviews.title: Easy docking station.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best docking stations as far as docking. I can do it without much fuss unlike the last docking station I had.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Bought as Christmas present for kids. Haven't heard any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tierney

customer_reviews.title: Ok but defective
customer_reviews.text: It works good but one of the adapter is defective so only one charger works
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Charges PS4 controllers as expected. The nice thing about this docking station is how easy it is to use. This docking station replaced a different one that was kind of tricky to connect. So tricky that I ended up bending and eventually breaking the connector. With this one, you just rest the controller on top of it, and that's it. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Rene Reinoso

customer_reviews.title: 💚
customer_reviews.text: At first it wouldn't charge my controllers . I went to GameStop and bought original charging wire for Dual Shock remote and the original wire charged my remotes . Now this station works and charges my remote but my remotes had to be completely charged first by the original wire.
customer_reviews.author: Julissa

customer_reviews.title: Must have charger!
customer_reviews.text: Product works well and I love it. Keeps my remotes charged up and looks good too. I especially like the fact that I can always find my remotes when they aren't in use!
customer_reviews.author: Santino

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. I purchased this because I needed an additional charger for my controllers, and I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great charging dock if you have young kids.
customer_reviews.text: This charging dock is great, especially if you have young children. The charging attachment allows you to be able to just set the controllers on top of the dock to charge them. “Note” If you have the dock plugged into your PS4 it will NOT charge the controllers when the system is powered off. This is easily dealt with by plugging the dock into a USB wall chager.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Worked well then didn't
customer_reviews.text: It worked real well for about a week or 2. And now without the adapter being removed from the controller, one doesn't charge when docked. So I have 1 docking spot to charge 3 controllers.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Good design , compact in a good way
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and very compact it fit on my nightstand
customer_reviews.author: Trinimex

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I that I didn't like were the bright blue led lights
customer_reviews.text: It's clean, stylish and functions as it should. The only thing I that I didn't like were the bright blue led lights, but I'm sure there's a way to darken it. Still, I highly recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph I. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: This is really easy to use and set up. I haven’t had any issues so I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: amazing seller and product
customer_reviews.text: If anyone out there is looking for a sleek, wireless charging option for your ps4 controllers, this is it!!!! easy use and operation, usb powered dock.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard edwards

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really wish the charger piece that stayed on the controller was smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Still works after months of use. Useful for switching controllers during extensive gaming sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Allred

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set and use for a younger child
customer_reviews.author: debo

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and for the price you cant beat it.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Controllers fit nicely and charge quickly
customer_reviews.author: Greg St.Clair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Best charger system. I tell all my friends about it
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Don’t drop your remote
customer_reviews.text: It’s cheap but it works like it’s supposed too 🙏🏽
customer_reviews.author: Robert Tapia

customer_reviews.title: This thing is garbage. It operates via the USB ports rendering it ...
customer_reviews.text: Most of the reviews on here have to be paid ones. This thing is garbage. It operates via the USB ports rendering it completely useless unless the PS4 is on and running. Whats the point in that? Were AC plugs so expensive it would have broke the bank using that type of power source? This is almost completely worthless as a charging port. Instead of turning your PS4 on to play games, you have to turn it on to charge your controllers. I'm looking for a different one already.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful product which performs precisely as advertised. I was skeptical at first as the charging yellow light atop the controller did not pulsate as it normally should but I then realized the controller was already fully charged, at which point the front of the product will elicit a steady blue light from the front of the unit. After using the controller for a while then placing it back on its mount on the unit I found the blue light to be red, indicating the controller is being charged. But my favorite thing about this charger is its striking resemblance to my PS4 console; it's very aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: CHEAPLY MADE
customer_reviews.text: Garbage at best. Got this as a Xmas present, and it crapped out not even a month later. Worked great for one controller...But when two ds4 controllers were placed on the cradle, it would turn off. Kinda defeats the purpose of a "twin" docking station. Very cheap feeling as well, not a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Holly L Twitty

product_meta.title: Venom Twin Sony Docking Station - Dual Charging for PS4 Controller/ Gamepad - PlayStation 4
feature_bullets: No more cables. Just place the Controllers onto the Twin docking station for Easy charging
Rapid recharge cradle for 2 Dualshock4 wireless Controllers
Polished Black & Matt finish to match Controllers & PS4 system
Red LED charge indicators turn to Blue once Controllers are fully charged
Supplied with X2 micro USB dongles and USB cable
